# AttributedString.TextAlignment

**Enumeration**

The explicit alignment of text within its container.

## Declaration

```swift
enum TextAlignment
```

## Overview

Alignment defines the horizontal position of each line within its container.

## Enumeration Cases

- **AttributedString.TextAlignment.center**: The horizontal center of each line is aligned to the horizontal center of the container.
- **AttributedString.TextAlignment.left**: The left edge of each line is aligned to the left edge of the container.
- **AttributedString.TextAlignment.right**: The right edge of each line is aligned to the right edge of the container.

## Conforms To

- CaseIterable
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
